name: Delivery Driver (Dias)
description:
Hey hey, this is my first ever game, which I created as part of the Unity Course available at https://www.udemy.com/course/unitycourse/. For this project, I designed my own map, modified the package delivery and boost assets, and included a package counter to enhance the gameplay experience.

Although I could have added more features to the game, such as advanced animations or sound effects, I decided not to invest too much time into it as it was primarily a practice project. Instead, I focused on implementing the essential elements to make the game functional and easy to navigate, allowing me to learn more about game development basics in Unity.
